title: Mouryou no Hako: Chuuzenji Atsuko no Jikenbo - Hako no Yurei no Koto
synopsis: A side story that reveals the investigative notes that Atsuko, the younger sister of the main character Akihiko Chuzenji, wrote about the brutal dismembering incidents in the main story.
staff: [['Nakamura, Ryousuke', ['Director']], ['Nightmare', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['CLAMP', ['Original Character Design']], ['Nishida, Asako', ['Character Design']]]
